column5: Has anyone had any experience with the Blue Chart map for LOTW? You all know how important it is to be precise in our navigation on this lake. How accurate is it? How does it compare to the paper Canadian Hydrographic maps? Frosty

I have it installed on the gps now but it's too new to have run it on the water. From what I see on the computer (and unit), it appears to correlate much better with the Canadian Hydrographic map than the Hot Spots version.....but some time on the water this summer will tell for sure. I'm happy with the purchase. It looks to be more accurate.
